title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Harvard victory leaves scientists feeling vindicated but uncertain
items.description: Trump administration vows to appeal ruling that it illegally cut $2.2 billion in research funding

items.title: The last gift: How bodies donated for research may help find a cure for HIV
items.description: Pioneering project uses “rapid autopsies” to find virus hideouts in infected people

items.title: New ‘hyperlocal’ forecasts aim to give Indian cities early warning of monsoon floods
items.description: In Mumbai, new tools provided up to 3 days notice of dangerous downpours

items.title: After ‘humiliating’ raid, Burkina Faso halts ‘gene drive’ project to fight malaria
items.description: Disinformation campaign may have triggered “brutal” shutdown of mosquito lab

items.title: Studies deliver new blow to cancer microbiome literature—and offer a way forward
items.description: Two analyses of microbial DNA in tumor samples aim to put controversy-riddled field back on track

items.title: Mosquito-borne viruses surge in a warming Europe
items.description: Chikungunya cases break records in France; West Nile virus appears near Rome

items.title: Ancient skeletons’ genes reveal origin of the Slavic people
items.description: DNA connects modern Slavs to a wave of migration following the fall of the Roman Empire

items.title: Data from defunct NASA lander paint a radical new picture of Mars’s interior
items.description: Studies identify a solid inner core and buried remnants of giant impacts

items.title: Ant queen lays eggs that hatch into two species
items.description: Bizarre discovery of interspecies cloning “almost impossible to believe,” biologists say

items.title: Vote by Dutch lawmakers threatens major primate research center
items.description: In victory for animal rights activists, research on monkeys would end in 2030
